summary: App with light pink and purple color scheme on white background
architectural_notes: Color scheme: light pink (primary), purple (accent), white (background)
Design philosophy: appealing and cohesive using mostly light pink

existing_features.title: Update the global color scheme to use crisp white as the primary background color throughout the entire application
Update the color theme to use light pink as the primary accent color for UI elements including buttons, cards, borders, highlights, and interactive elements
Add purple as a secondary accent color to complement light pink, creating visual appeal and hierarchy in the UI
Update the Tailwind theme configuration in tailwind.config.js to define light pink and purple color variables that can be used consistently across components
Update index.css theme variables to reflect the new light pink and purple color scheme, ensuring consistency with Tailwind configuration
Update all existing components to use the new light pink and purple color scheme, replacing current color references with the new theme tokens
